text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-tags
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    sdohSDOHSocial Determinants of Health Category
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-observation-category
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/observation-category

name: USCoreObservationCategory
title: US Core Observation Category
description: HL7 FHIR concepts to classify an observation
